channel.title: 15.0.0.6.6 not working, blank screen
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm getting a blank screen when I'm trying to start the Whonix-Workstation-XFCE version 15.0.0.6.6, the latest available. I don't get this with my older 15.0.0.3.3.
I'm simply importing the image file using virtual box 5.2.34 in the standard way. It starts up but once it is about to load x windows nothing comes to life, just a blank screen.
What should I do?

item.title: 15.0.0.6.6 not working, blank screen
item.dc:creator: Patrick_mobile
item.description:
Which virtualizer?

Debug.

Login in virtual console possible?

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Desktop#Virtual_Consoles

Check logs.

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Troubleshooting#System_Logs

Debug lightdm.

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Troubleshooting#lightdm

Read full topic
